column1: #Text=Tachikawa ( 立川市 Tachikawa-shi ) is a city in western Tokyo .
#Text=Downtown Tachikawa is served by the JR Chuo line , JR Nambu line , and Tama Monorail .
#Text=Showa Kinen Park ( Showa Memorial Park 昭和記念公園 ) , located at a former US Air Base , the land was regained as a spacious park .
#Text=Green Belt , perfect for walking or riding a bike .
#Text=It goes from Tachikawa North , to Kunitachi .
#Text=Subaru of Tachikawa ( aka Car Do ) , one of the largest Subaru dealers featuring large amounts of aftermarket parts as well as used cars .
#Text=There are several movie theaters and a department store near the station .
#Text=Tachikawa Racetrack ( たちかわ競輪場 ) ( A short ( free ) bus ride from Tachikawa Station . ) , ☏ +81 42-524-1121 .
#Text=Bicycle racing takes place on a banked oval track .
#Text=Tokyo Summerland ( 東京サマーランド ) , 東京都あきる野市上代継600 ( 30 minutes of bus from Hachioji station ) , ☏ +81 42-558-6511 .

column3: 東京都あきる野市上代継600

column1: #Text=Showa Kinen Park Rainbow Pool ( 昭和記念公園レインボープール ) ( 2 minutes walk from Nishi Tachikawa station on the JR Ōme Line , or 15 minutes walk from Tachikawa Station . ) , ☏ +81 42-528-1751 .

column3: 昭和記念公園レインボープール

column1: #Text=There are many department stores , Isetan , Takashimaya , Lumine , Granduo , and so on .
#Text=They all are popular Japanese shopping department stores .
#Text=Takashimaya and Isetan are famous department stores in Japan , so it might have shop clerks who can speak English or other languages .
#Text=Most department stores have some café or restaurants , so you can rest while shopping. .
#Text=Granduo ( left at exit subway/metro ) has good eating area at the 6th and 7th floor .
#Text=Palace Hotel Tachikawa , 2-40-15 Akebonocho ( 5 minutes walk on 1st level pedestrian walking bridge . ) , ☏ +81 42-527-1111 .
#Text=Business hotel with nice staff , many of whom speak English .
#Text=Tachikawa Immigration Branch Office ( 東京入国管理局 立川出張所 ) , Kita 3-31-2 , ☏ +81 42-528-7179 .
#Text=This small immigration branch office can perform various services for foreign residents of Japan .
#Text=It does n't have a full range of services , though , so check the website carefully before heading out .
#Text=Unlike some other immigration offices , they speak no English — Japanese is necessary .
#Text=Prices for immigration services are standard across the country .
